timers.text: Hello people from the interwebs we all a fun bunch here. We hope you enjoy it here.

I'm proud to be a member of the Fight Like A Dragon giveaway, in support of Tempest and to bring awareness to Sarcoma. Check out  https://playr.gg/MommaB365/fld for details on how to enter, and each item of merch purchased gets you a secret code to enter there for more chances to win!
